alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 2:30PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Umatilla County through 300 PM PDT... At 229 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Umatilla to 15 miles south of Pendleton. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hermiston, Pendleton, Stanfield, Echo, Holdman, Rieth, Mission and northwestern Umatilla Reservation. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon; Lower Columbia Basin of Oregon
